CS:GO is my first real introduction to e-sports, but understand this: It is not fun. You are not allowed to have fun in CS:GO. The only purpose you are allowed to have for picking up this game and playing it, is to become a very good player, or have an extremely high rank. Being only okay, or just good at it is a gateway to instant toxicity for which you will be shamed and humiliated. If you are a new player then you better be a fast learner because the players you encounter will shun you for not knowing every mechanic in the game within your first 5 minutes of playing. It took me almost 900 hours on my very first account to grind and get good before I event thought of playing comp. Now with 6k hours across two accounts the grind finally finished in the end achieving high ranks, and respect from peers. Regardless I love CS:GO, and I will always love it even though the addiction has faded away. From hundreds of hours every 2 weeks to now 20-30 it is still my first introduction to FPS games.
Shit value, update this piece of shit, with so many bugs

Good Game But Have More Hackers

Странная но хорошая игра. Обновленный "наследник" CS 1.6. Конечно имеет кучу осечек, багов и лагов. Со слабым интернетом, теперь нормально не поиграть. Железо должно быть относительно крутое ибо будет тяжко играть. Если не хотите тратить нервы в рейтингах и т.д., тогда просто играйте в удовольствие.
